low.title: Great Job! Your Home is Energy Efficient
tips: Consider solar panels to further reduce energy costs
Look into utility rebate programs for additional savings
Schedule annual HVAC maintenance to keep efficiency high

medium.title: Good Start — Room for Improvement
tips: Upgrade to a smart thermostat to save 10-15% on heating/cooling
Add insulation to your attic — it pays for itself in 2-3 years
Replace incandescent bulbs with LEDs to cut lighting costs by 75%
Seal air leaks around windows and doors with weatherstripping

high.title: Significant Savings Opportunity
tips: Upgrade your HVAC system to a high-efficiency model for 20-40% savings
Replace single-pane windows with double-pane Energy Star windows
Add insulation throughout — walls, attic, and crawl spaces
Install a smart thermostat and program temperature setbacks
Switch all lighting to LED bulbs
Consider a tankless or heat pump water heater
